abstract: Detroit Red Wings beat Philadelphia Flyers, 3-0.

headline.print_headline: Red Wings Move Closer to Postseason Berth
headline.main: Red Wings Move Closer to Postseason Berth

snippet: Jimmy Howard made 30 saves and Darren Helm, Andreas Athanasiou and Kyle Quincey scored as Detroit beat Philadelphia.
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Howard made 30 saves and Darren Helm, Andreas Athanasiou and Kyle Quincey scored as Detroit beat Philadelphia.
